customer_arrives.speaker: Narrator
customer_arrives.text: The bell above the door chimes. Your very first customer steps inside, looking around curiously.

customer_greets.speaker: Customer
customer_greets.text: Oh! I heard this place was reopening. It's been closed for so long... I used to come here years ago.

player_response.speaker: Narrator
player_response.text: How do you greet your first customer?

choices.text: Welcome! I'm honored to serve you.
Please, have a seat. What can I get you?

warm_welcome.speaker: Customer
warm_welcome.text: *Smiles warmly* You have the same spirit as the old owner. This place always felt special.

professional_welcome.speaker: Customer
professional_welcome.text: Thank you. I'll have whatever you recommend - I trust the cafe's taste.

customer_orders.speaker: Narrator
customer_orders.text: You prepare a simple but heartfelt meal. The customer takes a bite and their eyes light up.

customer_satisfied.speaker: Customer
customer_satisfied.text: Delicious! The warmth in this food... it reminds me of better days. I'll definitely be back.

customer_leaves.speaker: Narrator
customer_leaves.text: Your first customer leaves satisfied, promising to spread the word. Dragon Haven Cafe is officially open for business.
